name: betteraskprompt-backend
description: Express.js backend API for EdPicker Prompt Engineering Coach

scripts.deploy:cloudrun: gcloud builds submit --tag gcr.io/$PROJECT_ID/betteraskprompt-backend && gcloud run deploy betteraskprompt-backend --image gcr.io/$PROJECT_ID/betteraskprompt-backend --platform managed --region us-central1 --allow-unauthenticated
